column2: ENGLISH
That [GetRootFrominsult] [From.GetBestName] has declared war upon me with the presumed notion to free hostages I have rightfully captured! This gives me just cause to execute them, if I so wish...
This war must end, offer to send their people back.
I must make an example, execute [chosen_captive.GetFirstName].
How dare they? Execute ALL captives!
We shall meet on the battlefield.
[From.GetBestName] has sent an envoy with an offer - if we were to end this war, [From.GetSheHe] will release all the captives and allow them safe passage to our court!
Excellent! We accept.
Ha! I am in this for the loot and plunder, the war is still on!
[From.GetBestName] has accepted our offer to release the captives, the war is over!
It is for the best.
[From.GetBestName] had the guts to deny our offer. Apparently, the lives of the captives do not mean anything to [From.GetHerHim] - it was all a ruse to declare war!
The war goes on.
Let us see if they mean little to [From.GetHerHim] when they are all dead!
Disaster! In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFrominsult] [From.GetBestName] has beheaded [chosen_captive.GetFirstName]! We should have seen this coming...
Oh, now it is personal!
In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFrominsult] [From.GetBestName] has has all captives beheaded! We should have seen this coming...
This is a war of vengeance now!

My heart burns with fervor upon hearing of the poor [Root.Religion.GetName] souls being oppressed in the realm of [liberate_target.GetBestName]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] intended for all true believers to be free to decide their own fate, but if [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is preoccupied with divine things perhaps I should carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
I must liberate my [Root.Religion.GetName] brethren!
I have better things to do...

Our Tributary State of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has apparently decided to stop paying us tribute - [From.GetTitledFirstName] calls us "weak" and claims that we are "unable to defend [From.GetHerHis] realm", what nonsense!
Perhaps it is time to make [From.GetHerHim] get back in line...

[tribute_war_suzerain.GetTitledFirstName] wishes to extort a flow of gold from the worlds of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [tribute_war_suzerain.GetSheHeCap] is willing to send [tribute_war_suzerain.GetHerHis] soldiers to die for it. But am I as willing to send mine? I could surrender peacefully now and end this before my soldiers are potentially slaughtered, their families left to die and villages burnt to the ground... Or we fight to protect our world and drive back these [tribute_war_suzerain.Culture.GetName] invaders!
I shall end this before the blood of my people flows throughout the world.
We must protect what is ours! We shall fight!

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Let us resolve this conflict peacefully. In exchange for putting a stop to this war and preventing bloodshed I shall agree to your demands and the worlds of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will pay tribute to you. All I ask is that you promise safety for my people and send your soldiers home.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
A wise decision! I shall accept [From.GetHerHis] proposal.
Look at the coward beg and plead! There will be no peace for [From.GetHerHim] that easily.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

You have made a wise decision, I shall accept your offer and send my soldiers home in exchange for tribute from your worlds.

Signed
[From.GetTitledName]
We are safe... for now...

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your offer is one of a coward, prepare your soldiers to meet in battle like a real warrior would.

Signed
[From.GetTitledName]
I had a feeling it would come to this.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. War Engineer [mexikhan_siege_engineer_1.GetDynName] along with two of [mexikhan_siege_engineer_1.GetHerHis] apprentices, [mexikhan_siege_engineer_2.GetDynName] and [mexikhan_siege_engineer_3.GetDynName], have been dispatched to your court.
Send my most sincere gratitude to the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].
I will put them to use immediately!

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously received your relief expedition and put their supplies to good use. The generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
Anything to please the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], agrees with your wise judgement that [mexikhan_invasion_target.GetFullName] threatens to destabilize the world. The forces of the [From.Offmap.GetFullName] are already marching out of Mexikha.
We shall humbly assist the Huetlatoani in this endeavor!
Just as planned...

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous artifact of expert [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] craftsmanship will be bestowed upon you for safekeeping.
Truly a magnificent item!

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously accepted your offer of supplying [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] army with magnificent steeds.
May they trample your enemies!

The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the marauding [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. May your realm crumble under your incompetent rule.\n\nDo be warned that angering the enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName] is most unwise, do not act suprised when our forces come to put an end to your misguided raids.
I am not afraid of empty threats!
The raiders we sent to the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] have returned home, and we will not be able to send any further raids into Mexikha.
We shall raid again another day...
Despite your best attempts at making them breed, your Pandas have died without producing any offspring. Truly a sorrowful day...
Oh well.
Not my cuddly friends! How could you leave me?

The Radhanite merchants have cordially asked you to pay back the money you owe to them. They inform you that there is no hurry, but you can clearly tell that they are disappointed by the fact that you have yet to pay them back. It also seems that, for whatever reason, the amount of Radhanite trade going through your realm has reduced significantly...
I should have payed them back earlier...

Your messengers tell of a traveler who recently arrived in [tavern_location.GetName]. The traveler, a [traveling_teacher.Culture.GetName] Scholar by the name of [traveling_teacher.GetFullName], is apparently requesting an audience. [traveling_teacher.GetSheHeCap] claims to be a renowned teacher, willing to impart [traveling_teacher.GetHerHis] knowledge to one of your children!
Intriguing, bring [traveling_teacher.GetHerHim] to court!
I do not have time for this.
Bring [traveling_teacher.GetHerHim] over for a secluded dinner...

The traveling teacher bows before you and says: 'I humbly greet the [Root.GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetFirstName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]! My name is [traveling_teacher.GetFullName], and I come with an offer. For a modest sum I would be willing to impart one of my many skills to your [child_to_be_taught.GetDaughterSon] [child_to_be_taught.GetFirstName], for I am a scholar of both Nahuatl classics and surgery!'
Hm, can you teach [child_to_be_taught.GetHerHim] how to read faster?
I want you to teach [child_to_be_taught.GetHerHim] the Nahuatl classics!
The basics of surgery and poetry sound useful.
My [child_to_be_taught.GetDaughterSon] is dull and apathetic, could you inspire [child_to_be_taught.GetHerHis] curiosity?
What you are asking is outrageous, begone!

My [adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation] [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName] has offered to travel to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName], on a mission to bring glory to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. 'Please, my [Root.GetLordLady]', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] says. 'Let a humble servant strengthen your relations with the [the_protector_general.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortMexikhanHuetlatoaniName]!'
What a brilliant idea! Go, with my blessing.
I think [back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName] is better suited for the journey.
I'm sorry, but [back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName] would give a better impression of us...
Absolutely not! You are needed here, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName].

One morning I wake up before my guards have attempted to rouse me. I hear excited chatter coming from the main hall, and as I open the [Root.GetChamberOpening] there is a bustle of servants filling the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. '[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from the court of the [the_protector_general.GetTitle]!' they gossip.
And [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] comes bearing gifts? Excellent!

'The [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] is a fascinating place, my [Root.GetLordLady]' [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] says, as I turn the foreign coins over in my hand. [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHeCap] arrived this morning, and besides the obvious souvenirs, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] comes carrying many a tale from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels - everyone in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] wants to know everything.
Bear with us, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName], as my scribes collect all your stories...!

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] returned to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] late last night, seemingly exhausted from the journey. Today, during the briefing, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] simply appears relieved to be home again. Just as I begin to worry about the impression [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] must have made throughout [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] offers me a star systemled letter of greeting from the [the_protector_general.GetTitle] [the_protector_general.GetHerselfHimself]!
Not a complete failure then!

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has returned from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels. When my council inquire about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] impressions of the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] lets out an exasperated sigh. Then [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] unleashes a tirade about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeMexikhanConvoTopic].
This is not what I had hoped for...

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has finally returned from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]! However, when asked about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] adventures, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] just mutters, mostly about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeMexikhanConvoTopic].
I should have sent someone else in [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]'s stead.

On the eve of [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] return from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName], [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName] and I discuss at length [adventurous_spirit.GetMexikhanConvoTopic].\n'I'd also like to introduce you to someone', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] says, smiling.
Oh, how lovely! Welcome to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!
You invited a stranger to our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?

There is something different about [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] - as we discuss [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] speaks passionately about [adventurous_spirit.GetMexikhanConvoTopic]. 'Oh, my [Root.GetLordLady]. You must let me go back', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] pleads.
If this is what you want...
Out of the question, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]! You belong here in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
Oh, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]. Surely, you don't mean that?
But... How can you ask me to send you away again, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]?

When I first did not hear anything from [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName], I simply assumed that [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] journey back home had been delayed. Sadly, I have now formally received word from [the_protector_general.GetTitledName] of [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] passing.
At least the Rashtrapathi offers [the_protector_general.GetHerHis] condolences.
I shall have my scribes compose a letter to the [offmap_mexikha.Governor.GetTitle].
The [offmap_mexikha.Governor.GetTitle] will find out eventually.
You may stay. The [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] is no place for anyone right now.
This is not a criminal, you buffoons. [mexikhan_refugee.GetSheHeCap]'s a refugee!
I can make use of a veteran like you.
Why wasn't I told sooner? We need a physician here in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!

The enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously accepted your gift. [person_sent_as_tribute.GetImpressionOfTribute]. \n\nThe generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
I will be tackling the complexity of war... Or something along those lines.
It should be about the intricacies of relationships.
I will write about managing a realm....
Something in honor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], or... Something educational?
I just want to move my readers.
I shall chronicle my family history, of course.
To Compose a Book
Funding is not an issue.
Perhaps I can help?
I think you will manage just fine with the resources still at hand.
Composing a Book

My scribes have provided me with the latest draft of my book. Upon reading it, I am not convinced it is moving in the right direction. I could perhaps ask [friendly_advice_target.GetTitledName] for advice on the matter - if nothing else, [friendly_advice_target.GetSheHe] is likely to feel flattered by it.
I will seek [friendly_advice_target.GetHerHis] opinion.
I'd rather not get anyone else involved in this highly personal work...!
Composing a Book

Having invested myself in this literary endeavor, I have been feeling drained lately. When my scribes ask me what the next section of the book should be about, I throw my hands out in the air. How should I know? You cannot rush these things - I need inspiration!
Perhaps I'll indulge in some late night festivities with my soldiers!
I could probably ask [my_doctor.GetFirstName] for some kind of... draught.
I clearly just need a break...
Composing a Book
I could do this all night. Maybe I should...!
I probably need to sleep on this.
Composing a Book
The Book Composed

[Root.GetMourningBehavior]. Yet life goes on, and a letter from [the_protector_general.GetTitledFirstName] was received today. It expresses the condolences of the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap], assuring that the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] mourns with us.
'The world is worse off without your [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] in it'.

A servant informs me that we have a visitor. Cursing the early hour, I roll out of bed and make my way to the main hall. The envoy bows deeply, stating that the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle] wishes to express [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetHerHis] condolences, by gifting me something that used to belong to my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation], [FromFrom.GetTitledName].
I humbly accept the gift from the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle].
Please, take it away - it would only serve as a reminder of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] death.

My servants have finished cleaning out my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation]'s chambers and I have come to take a final look. [Root.GetMourningBehavior]. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], we found this', one of the servants says, interrupting my thoughts and handing me a small book.
Wait - this must have belonged to [FromFrom.GetHerHim]...!
Do you take me for a sentimental fool?
[From.GetTitledName]
The Fury of Mexikha
So be it.
The [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] will remember our name...!
And so the Jaguar recoils...
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] watch over us.
The Jaguar is not to be toyed with...
How unsettling...!
We would be humbled to serve the great [From.Offmap.GetFullName].
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] will not kneel without a fight!
We survived the wrath of the Jaguar...
Not all who face off against the Jaguar live to tell the tale.

'Halt!', comes a stern voice as we are approaching a bridge.\n'I am [other_ruler.GetTitledName]. We are currently guarding the road to the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName]... You, my fine [Root.GetLordLady], need to pay the bridge fee.' The smirk on the [other_ruler.GetManWoman]'s face makes me hesitate.
When in... wherever we are.
I won't give in to idle threats. Guards, my sword - now!
We will have none of that.

'Aaah, fellow travelers!' a military [other_ruler.GetManWoman] exclaims, emerging alongside a group of soldiers from the trees surrounding our camp. 'I am [other_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. We are here to escort my [Root.GetLordLady] to [Root.GetRandomMexikhanRegion].' [other_ruler.GetSheHeCap] gestures for [Root.GetHerHis] troops to join my entourage for the evening.
Oh, [other_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]! There's... been a change of plans.
I think you have me confused with someone...

A group of soldiers have blocked the route for our caravan. 'Please, we have not eaten in months', a tall [other_ruler.GetManWoman] pleads, before taking another step forwards: 'I am [other_ruler.GetTitledName]. You will let us dine with your people tonight...!' The threat sounds empty, as the leader struggles to remain upright.
No need for posturing, [other_ruler.GetTitle]. We have enough food for everyone.
The [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] clearly does nothing for you... You should work for me!
We cannot afford to take pity on strangers...!

As the days drag on, I find myself thinking back to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName], wondering what is happening in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. And how is [person_missed.GetTitledFirstName] faring, without me there? When can I return home to [person_missed.GetHerHim], when my journey to Mexikha never seems to end?
Halt! I need to send a letter to my dear [person_missed.GetFirstName].
Halt! I need to compose some thoughts to my friend...
Guards! I need to send a letter to my [person_missed.GetHusbandWife].
Guards! I need to send a letter to my [person_missed.GetFatherMother].
Halt! My [person_missed.GetSonDaughter] needs a letter from me.
No, my retinue needs their [Root.GetTitle] riding, alongside them.

Having reached the glorious capital of the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName], it only takes a few days before a group of ministers approach me, offering to read and discuss chapters from the 'Writings of Kautilya'. They think I, as a [Root.Religion.GetName], will be particularly interested by the section on 'victorious inner-restraint'.
Of course! I would love to hear more about your political philosophy.
Actually, I'm already well familiar with 'the Arthashastra', my lords.
Nonsense! I want to look around the palace - perhaps a tour?

My guards and I have been making our way through a bustling market this morning. There is ample supply of every meat and game, and trinkets and baubles abound...! Here and there we encounter soldiers, along with dignitaries from other foreign courts. There is clearly no shortage of business for these traders.
Mmmh, what is that smell...?
I am here to trade! You there, let's talk business.
Guards... You keep that trader occupied...
I think I've had enough for one day.

Our caravan has been approached by a smooth-faced [mexikhan_trader.Culture.GetName] [mexikhan_trader.GetManWoman], claiming to be a renowned trader. After finally getting my attention [mexikhan_trader.GetSheHe] beckons me over to [mexikhan_trader.GetHerHis] own horse, where something is strapped to its saddle. 'Name's [mexikhan_trader.GetBestName], my good [Root.GetLordLady]! Might my latest acquisition interest you?'
Ooh, that looks [mexikhan_artifact.GetArtifactDescriptor]. Let me take it off your hands!
You're certainly a charmer... I could use someone like you.
Guards. I'm suddenly in the mood for a gift...
Flattery gets you nowhere, peddler.
The servants of the [From.Liege.GetTitle] are always welcome in my realm.
I have no time to entertain guests at present.

After a tour of [Root.Capital.GetName] and a fortnight at my court, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s visit has reached its end. Thanks to the meticulous preparations made by my [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle], [corresponding_councilor.GetTitledFirstName], everything went smoothly. The [From.GetJobTitle] has returned home with [From.GetCGMissionOutcome] for [From.GetHerHis] [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress].
Well done, [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle] [corresponding_councilor.GetFirstName].

As the welcoming feast ends, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] and I retreat to finish our conversation in private, observing the moon from the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] walls. Suddenly, bright lights streak across the sky, and the [From.GetJobTitle]'s visage turns ashen. 'Bad omen,' mutters the translator and the two [From.GetMenWomen] make a hasty departure.
Wait, come back! We were getting on so well!

The preparations for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival tomorrow are well under way, but I find myself pondering what more I could do to make [From.GetHerHim] feel welcome. Even though a proficient translator has been summoned, would it not be a nice gesture for me to greet [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] native tongue?
I shall spend ALL NIGHT learning complicated phrases to truly impress!
An hour or two to prepare a simple greeting should suffice.
How fortunate that I already know the basics of the language!
It would be unwise. I cannot hope to rival the translator's skill.

I asked the translator to not only instruct me in the proper pronunciation, but also teach me the grammar and meaning behind the words. It took many hours, but the pleased look on [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName]'s [FromFrom.GetFaceDescription] face as I greet [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in flawless Nomadic proves that it was worth the effort.
Language holds more power than most [Root.GetMenWomen] understand.

'My [Root.GetLordLady], please wake up!' I sit up with a start. Where am I? My eyes dart around the room. The library! 'The guests are waiting! Forgive me, my [Root.GetLordLady], we didn't know where you were. We've been star systemrching the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] for hours!' I bury my face in my hands. I have not yet received my guests, and the visit is already a disaster...
Curse those early risers, the sun is barely up!

I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed, and as I dressed this morning, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was there to help me with the pronunciation. I have no idea what the elaborate phrases mean, but at least they come out somewhat smoothly as I greet [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName].
That went well, I think!

I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed. However, as I stood before [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName] this morning, it was as if someone had wiped the words from my mind! I forgot every other word and stuttered something awful...
I have never been so mortified!

I had my servant buy an exquisite cape of Nomadic textile with the proper accessories in preparation for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival. However, as I welcomed [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] entourage, the sight of my new robe seemed to displease [From.GetHerHim]! Later, the translator told me I wore several attributes exclusive to the [From.Liege.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]'s family.
Guards! Find me the merchant responsible!

As I am walking in the gardens with my guest [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] I comment on the sunny skies. The translator repeats my words and after a moment of thought, [From.GetDynName] replies with ardent enthusiasm. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thinks my pleasantries are a metaphor for the enlightened nature of the enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]!
I never knew talking about the weather could be so fruitful!

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has generously decided to send you a skilled physician from [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] court. [mexikhan_doctor.GetDynName] will serve you well.
Send my most sincere gratitude to the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously accepted your gift. The generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
Anything to please the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has decided that there shall be no war and strife between our two nations. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] infinite mercy and wisdom is an inspiration to us all.
May there forever be harmony between the houses of [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], sends [From.GetHerHisCap] sincerest regards and accepts your pledge of allegiance. May the bond between our two nations last for all time.
I am but a humble servant of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has generously granted your request. The sage scholar-bureaucrat [mexikhan_administrator.GetDynName] will join your court. [mexikhan_administrator.GetHerHisCap] administrative skills will serve you well.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has generously granted your request. The master engineer [mexikhan_master_engineer.GetDynName] will enlighten your nation.
A terraced field has been built in §Y[ssi_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Mason §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A ballcourt has been built in §Y[ssi_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Mason §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A dry dock has been built in §Y[ssi_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Mason §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A reservoir has been built in §Y[ssi_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Mason §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A telpochcalli school has been built in §Y[ssi_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Mason §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. The skills of [mexikhan_strategist.GetDynName] will be at your disposal, in the war room as well as on the field of battle.
We are honored. The arrival of [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName] is much awaited.
Becoming your [Root.GetHusbandWife] is a great honor, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
A Divine Union

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has now married the Driftan [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]. The grand ceremony and the foreign [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] will be the talk of the realm for many years to come.
I wish them happiness and many healthy children.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nIt has come to the attention of the enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortMexikhanHuetlatoaniName] that merchants from your worlds have been acting with deceit and dishonesty while conducting trade with our merchants. We are certain that you will make sure that this behavior will cease immediately.
We need to restrict the privileges of the major trade guilds.
I'll have [target_marshal.GetFirstName] seek out and deal with the worst troublemakers.
How our merchants conduct their trade is no business for the crown.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has reprimanded merchants in our region, citing misconduct in other realms. However, there are those arguing that the rights of merchants from [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] does not fall under the jurisdiction of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. While it might anger the [From.GetTitle], I am considering a public show of resolve.
I'll make a public statement about [From.GetHerHis] blatant misuse of power!
I should make sure that I'm in good standing with [From.GetFirstName].

Your vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName], was less than impressed by your intrusion on merchant rights in the cities of [From.GetHerHis] worlds. [From.GetSheHeCap] has now made a public statement on how this action was an unjustified use of power in an area of [From.GetHerHis] responsibility.
[From.GetHerHisCap] merchants had to be kept in line!

Last night, [mexikhan_courtier.GetBestName] and I ended up having discussions until dawn, about [mexikhan_courtier.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]. I must have made a good impression, as [mexikhan_courtier.GetSheHe] told me that [mexikhan_courtier.GetSheHe] will be sending a letter, praising the hospitality [mexikhan_courtier.GetSheHe] has received.
A pleasant evening.
I need to make sure that everyone knows about this.

I have noticed that [mexikhan_courtier.GetBestName] has grown increasingly aggravated during the last couple of weeks, and today something extra unthoughtful slipped my tongue which caused [mexikhan_courtier.GetHerHim] to storm off exclaiming that the Huetlatoani would hear about this.
This might upset our relations with [offmap_mexikha.Governor.Offmap.GetShortName].
Guards arrest that [mexikhan_courtier.GetManWoman]!

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has generously granted your request. A Driftan star systeml has been delivered denoting the status of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] as a favored state for Driftan goods.
Splendid!

My council informs that the Nomadic [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle] has sent significant forces from the heart of Mexikha, to support their outlying regions in the Old World. Leaning over the war table, I can only hope that my silence instills confidence in my advisors. In my own chest, I feel a mild panic rising.

My council informs that a forest of sails has appeared on the horizon - the terrible Nahuatl scourge has reached our shores. Leaning over the war table, I can only hope that my silence instills confidence in my advisors. In my own chest, I feel a mild panic rising.
May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] help us...
The Driftan Nomadic fleet has arrived with troops from the Star System of Canarias, near the province of §YAnti-Atlas§!.
The Driftan Nomadic fleet has arrived with troops from the world's End, near the province of §YCornwall§!.

Through years of careful strategic planning, repeated tactical brilliance, and a measure of luck that makes believers of us all, we have managed to whittle down the enemy armies! I am almost beginning to dream of victory, when my generals inform me that the Nomadic [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle] has dispatched more forces to the Old World.
What does it take to bring down this beast?!

The journey to visit the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] of [offmap_mexikha.GetName] and show my subservience will take months if not even years. I take my farewells to my near and dear and prepare the caravan for departure.
Let's get going!

Our caravan has been camped by the roadside the whole day. The sky has been pouring over us with unusually heavy rain. The whole situation has brought my thoughts to the memories of my late [target_relative.GetRootRelation], [target_relative.GetFirstName].
I can't dwell in the past, I need to carry on forward.
You burn incense to honor their memory and step outside to wash away your tears under the crying sky.

A rider approached the caravan and handed me a letter with the star systeml of [target_host.GetBestName]. [target_host.GetFirstName] has heard of my travels and invites our party to rest for a while in the warmth of the [target_host.GetCapitalHolding] [target_host.Capital.Capital.GetName].
This could prove to be an opportunity to get even.
A warm bed and a hot meal is most welcome.
I prefer my tent as accommodation.
You utilize your rival's hospitality to set up a risky murder attempt on them.
You accept the invitation to the court of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName].

A warm hearth and healthy meals has invigorated the whole company, but after enjoying the hospitality of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] for some days it's now time to get moving on our path towards [offmap_mexikha.GetName] again.

The previous days have certainly been a delight. I never imagined that we could have so many things in common. It's with regret that I bid farewell to [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] when we decide to move on towards our goal of [offmap_mexikha.GetName].

We are presented with a deliciously looking meal when [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] raises [target_host.GetHerHis] chalice to honor us with a toast. Longing for a good drink I take a big gulp before I notice that [target_host.GetFirstName] turns [target_host.GetHerHis] chalice upside down emptying its content on the floor, laughing manically.
Thank you for being an excellent host.
Let's keep in touch.
Thank you but we need to be on our way.
No, you! You...
The room starts spinning and you black out.
Regaining my conciousness I find myself in the ditch to the side of the road. In my pocket I discover a letter with the firmest handwriting reading 'This is your last warning, stay out of here!'.
I have a terrible ache in my whole body.
You turn over and empty your bowels in the ditch.

'Trust is such a delicate thing', I tell my horse galloping away in the dark night, accompanied by the sound of screams and clattering plates while panic ensues behind us. Some of my servants also had to put their life to it for the whole charade to be believable, but that is an acceptable price to pay.

Just as you are about to make your escape into the dead of the night you are apprehended by the Captain of the guard. Sweat started forming on the temples of your head. Any second now.\nThere's the bellowing scream of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s guts exploding. For a split second you notice the shock in the face of the Captain, as someone exclaims that the [target_host.GetTitle] is dead. Then his eyes refocus on you. Without hesitation, the burly man raises his sword and cuts you in half.

During the dinner, [target_host.GetTitledFirstName], exclaims that [target_host.GetSheHe] has a present for you. Seconds later a man with an arrow sticking out of his back is dragged into the room. With fear you immediately recognize the man from your company that you ordered to assassinate [target_host.GetFirstName]. With a finger pointed towards your head [target_host.GetFirstName] shouts 'I sentence you all to die for your treachery!'. From every corner of the room, guards with drawn weapons are closing a circle fast around your band.
[target_host.GetSheHeCap] should have known better than to trust me.
Now we're even!
There is no escape!
Fatal Hospitality
Our company has finally reached the central worlds of the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName]. Mexikha in all its magnificence lay before us with so much to experience.
Let us walk lest I forget about the reason for the journey.
You start to travel on the Driftan roads towards the Driftan palace.
I'm out on a walk in a beautiful park in Mexikha when I spot a group of people gathered up around a symmetrical cross board throwing snail shells.
Let me show you how it's done.
'How do you play this game?'
I'll just enjoy the park instead.
The high priest started the ceremony right as I get inside the Nahuatl temple. The disciples enter a meditation to bring themselves into harmony with the cosmos.
Study their rituals from a distance.
Join in on their ceremony.
Loudly criticize their false religion.
Study the symbolism used in their texts.

'The [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] has kept [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetHerHis] eyes on you', the Chief Minister says. '[offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] is however very busy and thought it more fitting if you bowed in here instead of the occupied throne room'.

'The [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] has kept [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetHerHis] eyes on you', the Chief Minister says. 'You may enter the throne room to show your subordination, but be quick about it'.

The Chief Minister opens the doors to the throne room nodding for me to enter. After I've performed a deep bow in sign of subservience the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] reaches out and touches my forehead.
Bow before the depiction of the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap].
Refuse this humiliation and storm out of the room.
Hastily perform the pranama before the silent [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap].
I'm honored.
I cannot continue on my journey towards [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] since a state of hostility has occurred.
I cannot continue on my journey towards [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName] after they decided to close their borders and oust foreigners.
I cannot continue on my journey towards [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName].
How unfortunate.
I doubt that failure is an option...
Ah, to be recognized by the Huetlatoani!
I must try harder next time.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most displeased to find no efforts have been made to erect a new center of trade upon the trade routes with the Old World. [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] disappointment with his chosen [Root.GetTitle]s is great, and this failure will not soon be forgotten.
Alas! Woe be unto us...
Of course I am.
I must work harder to be deserving...

[FromFrom.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] [FromFrom.GetDynName], the Nomadic 'Xiuhpilli', has died and been succeeded by [From.GetDynName]. Like [From.GetPossPronoun] predecessor, the new [From.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] is known to believe in an [From.Offmap.GetPolicy] Mexikha. Apparently, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] takes a special interest in [From.Offmap.GetLike] but frowns on [From.Offmap.GetDislike].
Most inauspicious!
Most inauspicious!

After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the veteran armies of Mexikha finally managed to win a decisive battle near [GetRandomMexikhanRegion]. The Viking Fylkir was slain and his Driftan guards slaughtered to the last man.
Beware the Jaguar of the West...

After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the Vikings finally stand triumphant. The decisive battle was fought near [GetRandomMexikhanRegion]. The Viking Fylkir now sits upon the Skull Throne as [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetDynName]! However, Mexikha is likely to suffer Unrest for many years to come...
The Vikings truly are fearsome!

After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the veteran armies of Mexikha finally managed to win a decisive battle near [GetRandomMexikhanRegion]. The Inca Sapa was slain and his 12 elite guards slaughtered to the last man.
The Jaguar roars...

After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the Incas finally stand triumphant. The decisive battle was fought near [GetRandomMexikhanRegion]. The Inca Sapa now sits upon the Skull Throne as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]! However, Mexikha is likely to suffer Unrest for many years to come...
These Incas sound dangerous...
A House Divided...

The Nomadic Civil War has come to an abrubt end. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] utterly crushed the main rebel army in [GetRandomMexikhanRegion], ending the long years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances between loyalists, rabble-rousing priest, dynastic pretenders and an overly ambitious governor. Things are slowly returning to normal in Mexikha and the Triangular Trade Route is safe again.
Good, I could have some fresh Xocolate Brew!

After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances, the Nomadic Civil War is finally over. The old regime has fallen and [FromFrom.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName], a pretender prince of the old [FromFrom.Ruler.Dynasty.GetName] has emerged victorious and now sits upon the Skull Throne. Things are slowly returning to normal in Mexikha and the Triangular Trade Route is safe again.
The [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle] is always in need of more eunuchs! Take [mexikhan_envoy_eunuch_target.GetTitledFirstName].
[mexikhan_envoy_concubine_target.GetTitledFirstName] will make an excellent concubine for the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle].
We shall send plenty of gold for you to return with!
We will have a feast in [From.GetHerHis] honor! But what will my subjects think?
Your baubles and trinkets are of no importance here.
This will not change the chance of receiving a better artifact as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] §Glikes [This.GetLike]§! but §Rdislikes [This.GetDislike]§!
This will §Gincrease§! the chance of receiving a better artifact from the envoy, as the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle] §Glikes [This.GetLike]§!
This will §Rdecrease§! the chance of receiving a better artifact from the envoy, as the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle] §Rdislikes [This.GetDislike]§!
This option is available because you have a courtier to send as a §Yeunuch§!.
This option is available because you have a courtier to send as a §Yconcubine§!.
I have always considered myself a [Root.GetManWoman] of refined taste!
What a magnificent trinket, I shall certainly put it to good use!
It is not my fault [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is so picky!

After [mexikhan_guest.GetFullName]'s departure I was informed about a note in my room attached to a chest, it reads "To the [GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle], I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at your court and wanted to leave you a token of appreciation on behalf of myself and the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTitle]. I hope it pleases you."

My trusty and loyal steed [From.GetFirstName] is likely to be the target of all manner of malicious attacks by my enemies to destabilize my rule... I could have my smiths forge [From.GetHerHim] a set of armor to aid in protecting my most precious companion.
Only the finest armor can protect my precious [From.GetFirstName]!
A strong set of armor will keep [From.GetHerHim] safe.
It is imperative that [From.GetSheHe] has a basic set for protection.
[From.GetFirstName] will survive without a personal set of armor.

The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the traitorous [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

The enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], wishes for you to understand that [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetSheHe] can not tolerate such a lack of honor or loyalty from [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] Tributaries.
Your actions will be dealt with.
They do not scare us!
With the death of [From.GetBestName] you are free from your status as a tributary.

I have heard more news about [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems he and his men are moving with haste towards [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The rumors say that they have set their eyes on my worlds to be the starting point of their new Empire.
They shall get no easy fight here!

The word from the traders is that [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName] was set upon by the armies of the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName]. The rebel troops never stood a chance against the well supplied and loyal troops of the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap].
So much for the threats of [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName].
Only one can claim to be the Lord of Ten Thousand Years.
They were no match for the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName].
And now we bow to a jagar.
And now they bow to a jagar.

[offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], is no longer the only jagar to rule. General [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] [From.GetBirthName] has completed [From.GetHerHis] conquest and has crowned [From.GetHerselfHimself] [From.GetTitledName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims to be the true Xiuhpilli and Lord of Ten Thousand Years.\nTalk among the traders from the east say that the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetShortMexikhanHuetlatoaniName] is most angered by this pretender. The future of this new [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] remains in question but nobody can argue with results of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s invasion...

With the death of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been thrown into disarray. Many call for me to continue in the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] ways as my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] had intended but I am not so sure.
I will take up the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] traditions.
No. The time of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] ended with my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation].

[offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName] has closed off the Empire, decreasing trade along the Triangular Trade Route. This is not acceptable. [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] not only harms trade for [offmap_mexikha.GetShortName] but also for my own worlds. We must make the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] open up their borders one way or another...
War is the only way this shall be resolved!
The Triangular Trade Route is already ours, we just need to 'convince' the traders of that fact.
We must proceed carefully - let us negotiate first.
On second thought, this might not be the best idea...
The Triangular Trade Route is open... but at what cost?

After [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Triangular Trade Route be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable and mobilized [From.GetHerHis] forces to open the Triangular Trade Route by force. The [From.Culture.GetName] troops managed to overcome and defeat the forces of [offmap_mexikha.GetShortName] led by [offmap_mexikha.Governor.GetTitledFirstName].\nThe Xiuhpilli is most displeased with this loss and, under pressure by his advisors, has had no choice but to once more open up the Triangular Trade Route to traders.
It seems even a dormant jagar is a dangerous one...

After [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Triangular Trade Route be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable and mobilized [From.GetHerHis] forces to open the Triangular Trade Route by force. However, the [From.Culture.GetName] troops were no match for the forces of [offmap_mexikha.GetShortName] led by [offmap_mexikha.Governor.GetTitledFirstName].\nThe Xiuhpilli is most pleased with this victory and maintains the isolation of the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName].
And now commerce and trade return to the East.

After [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Triangular Trade Route be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable. Using [From.GetHerHis] vast influence over the wealth of the Triangular Trade Route, [From.GetTitledFirstName], coerced the traders to return to their posts. This influx of traders into the formerly dormant trading posts was felt all the way back in [offmap_mexikha.GetShortName] as they began transporting and selling their goods, much to the anger of the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap].\nWith no way of stopping this surge of trade the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] has had no choice but to officially reopen the Triangular Trade Route.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\nThe enlightened [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], has decreed that the Empire focus its efforts on the [offmap_mexikha.GetRandomMexikhanFocus].\nHence we do not have time to negotiate allowing your traders to return. I am sure you can understand why and respect this decision.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\nThe enlightened [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], demands that, in exchange for opening up the Triangular Trade Route, you [GetMexikhanForceOpenDemand].\nI am sure you can see how this will benefit both our nations and trust you to make the correct decision.
I am a wonderful negotiator.
I am impressed this ended without bloodshed.

Once again the Triangular Trade Route has opened! Negotiations for this began between [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], and [From.GetTitledName]. The two managed to come to an agreement in that the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] would order the reopening of trade and all [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetSheHe] asked was for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to [From.GetMexikhanForceOpenDemandMexikha].\nWhilst the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] may have preferred to stay in isolation, whispers from the East say that even [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetHerHis] closest advisors are pleased with this peaceful outcome.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\nThe enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], is most sorry to hear about the death of [FromFrom.GetTitledName], your [FromFrom.GetMexikhanCharacterRole], and offers you [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] most sincere condolences.
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] will be missed.

The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMexikhanComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].\n\nYou squander the gifts of the enlightened [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName]. We know that the death of [FromFrom.GetMexikhanCharacterRole] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] was by your hands. Do not think that the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] will look lightly upon this.
Mexikha shall belong to House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
Will [FromFrom.GetSheHe] be able to successfully tame the jagar?
And so rises a new jagar.

The forces of [From.GetBestName] have prevailed! With the troops of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] shattered and the conflicts in Mexikha finally over, the former [offmap_mexikha.PrevRuler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap], [offmap_mexikha.PrevRuler.GetOnlyDynastyName] [offmap_mexikha.PrevRuler.GetBirthName], has been dethroned and in [offmap_mexikha.PrevRuler.GetHerHis] place [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName], now rules!\nHouse [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has successfully invaded the Eastern worlds and now they reign supreme.\nGlory to the new [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap]!
And so the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] jagar remains.

The forces of [From.GetBestName] have been defeated! All across the [offmap_mexikha.GetShortName] heartworld they have been crushed in their many skirmishes with the troops of the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap].\nNow the forces in the Old World, led by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], have prevailed in their battles as well putting an end to this foolish invasion and dismantling [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] once and for all.
Maybe the [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetTlatoaniCihuatlatoaniCap] sent Assassins in secret?
Not only have I lost [invasion_of_mexikha_claimant.GetFirstName], but also this war!

Whispers in the East claim that [offmap_mexikha.Ruler.GetMediumMexikhanHuetlatoaniName] is in a joyous mood as the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] claimant, [invasion_of_mexikha_claimant.GetBestName], has died.\n[invasion_of_mexikha_claimant.GetHerHisCap] death has shattered the morale of the [From.Culture.GetName] forces who now retreat back to their homes in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nJust like [invasion_of_mexikha_claimant.GetBestName] this invasion of [offmap_mexikha.GetShortName] has come to an end.

A noble by the name of [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetFullName] came to court today seeking asylum. [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetSheHeCap] claims to have escaped from Mexikha after the rest of [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetHerHis] family was executed on orders of the Huetlatoani. "Oh great [Root.GetTitle], your merciful nature is known across the world. I implore you to grant me refuge. It would be an untold kindness!"
Of course you are welcome to stay.
I dare not anger the jagar.
Was there some kind of reward on your head?

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetMexikhanLetterBlessing].\n\n It has come to the attention of [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] that you are harboring an enemy of the [offmap_mexikha.GetName]. If [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetFullName] is not returned at once [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] will be most displeased.
I suppose we better return [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetHerHim].
I'm not scared of the Huetlatoani!

Despite [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetFullName]'s fears, no emissaries of the Nomadic Huetlatoani came looking for [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetHerHim]. "The time has come for me to leave. I will never forget your kindness, please take this as a token of my gratitude."
I will treasure it always.

Soon after writing to the Nomadic Huetlatoani, a very grateful emissary arrived with several guards to escort [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetFullName] back to the [offmap_mexikha.GetFullName]. "You can't understand what they'll do to me!" screamed [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetFirstName] as [escaped_mexikhan_noble.GetSheHe] was dragged out.
